headline: Putting it all together, each row of the CSV will represent one article. The first row is the header: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Then each subsequent row follows that structure with the extracted information.

headline: New Technology Breakthrough
author: Dr. Jane Smith
content: In a groundbreaking development, scientists have unveiled a revolutionary method capable of generating clean energy efficiently. This new technology promises significant environmental benefits by reducing carbon emissions and reliance on fossil fuels. The research team overcame several challenges during the development phase, including optimizing energy conversion rates and ensuring scalability for widespread application.
